thread.title: CHAN: Burkina Faso Star Vows To Upset Nigeria
thread.title_full: CHAN: Burkina Faso Star Vows To Upset Nigeria

author: Nurudeen Obalola
title: CHAN: Burkina Faso Star Vows To Upset Nigeria
text:
Headlines 
By Adeboye Amosu In Ouagadougou: Burkina Faso midfielder, Mohammed Sylla, says the side are looking to create a major upset by stopping Nigeria from making a second consecutive appearance at the African Nations Championships, reports Completesportsnigeria.com. The USFA playmaker and his colleagues face a tough task in their bid to make to the competition as they have to overturn the 2-0 deficit from the first leg.“It’s going to be a difficult, but I’m confident we can beat Nigeria here in Ouagadougou,” Sylla told completesportsnigeria.com.“We did well in the first leg, but it’s unfortunate that we lost the game.“Most people expect Nigeria to qualify, but we want to make name for ourselves by qualifying for CHAN.” The match will kick-off at 4pm (5pm Nigeria time).
